titleStmt.title: The Jacobite principles vindicated in answer to a letter sent to the author. Dedicated to the Queen of England.
titleStmt.author: Lawton, Charlwood, 1660-1721.

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2394 has pages cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
